cosmos.question: I am big and bright, shining in the day. I give warmth to the Earth, what am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot.
☀️ I appear every morning.
🌎 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth, but I'm not a car. I shine at night, sometimes round, sometimes a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Some people think I am made of cheese.
🌕 I have phases.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I am a collection of many stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am very, very big!
💫 Our solar system is part of one.
🥛 Some are shaped like spirals.

cosmos.question: I am a hot ball of gas that twinkles in the night sky, but I am much farther away than the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I have my own light.
🔭 You can see me better with a telescope.
🔥 I am made of burning gases.

cosmos.question: I am a cold and icy ball that leaves a bright tail as I fly through space near the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am mostly made of ice.
☄️ I'm like a dirty snowball.
☀️ The Sun makes my tail glow.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky, like the Big Dipper. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 One of the most famous ones looks like a bear.
🌠 Ancient people used to tell stories about me.
🔗 Stars make up my pattern.

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps the planets orbiting the Sun and you on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree can explain me.
⬇️ What goes up must come down because of me.
🧲 I'm like a giant magnet.

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky object orbiting the Sun, mostly found between Mars and Jupiter. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am smaller than a planet.
💥 Some people think I destroyed the dinosaurs when I hit Earth.
🪐 Many of my friends can be found between two planets.

cosmos.question: I am the name for the path a planet takes around a star.

hints.text: 🔄 I am a repeating journey.
🗺️ A circle or oval shape describes me.
🌎 Earth follows one around the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am the name for a huge explosion of a star.

hints.text: 💥 I happen at the end of a star's life.
✨ I am much brighter than a regular star.
💀 The result of me can be a black hole.

ocean.question: I have a shell and live in the ocean. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants, especially seaweed.
🐌 I am not very fast at all.

ocean.question: I am big and blue and full of water. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I have waves that crash on the shore.
🐳 Many animals live in me.
🚢 You need a boat to cross me.

ocean.question: I am a sea creature with eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change color to hide.
🦑 I squirt ink when I'm scared.
✋ I have no bones.

ocean.question: I am a very large fish, and some kinds have teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 Some people are afraid of me.
🌊 I live in salt water.
🦷 I am a predator and eat other fish.

ocean.question: I am a place where the land meets the ocean. You can build sandcastles here. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ People like to visit me when it's sunny.
🐚 You can find seashells here.
🚶 You can walk along me barefoot.

ocean.question: I am a huge mammal that lives in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am very large.
🎶 I communicate with others by making sounds.
🌊 I have a blowhole.

ocean.question: I am a small, colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. I am often orange and white with black stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🤡 I'm named after someone who works at a circus!
🐠 I live in a sea anemone and am protected from predators.
🌊 You can see me in the movie 'Finding Nemo'.

ocean.question: I am a type of hard rock under the sea. Many colorful fish like to live by me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of tiny animals.
🌈 I can be many different colors.
🐠 I am a home for many sea creatures.

ocean.question: I am a very long journey across the ocean. Sailors use me to find their way. What am I?

hints.text: 🧭 Sailors may use a map to help them with me
🗺️ People often go on me to discover new places.
🚢 I am a way to get from one place to another by sea.

ocean.question: I am a strong, underwater current that flows like a river in the ocean. I help to move warm water around the world. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I help keep some places warmer than others.
🌊 I am like a big water slide in the ocean.
🌍 I influence the world's climate.
